      • sharedCopy

        public MmappedSegmentedFile sharedCopy()
        Specified by:
        sharedCopy in interface SharedCloseable
        Specified by:
        sharedCopy in class SegmentedFile
        Returns:
        a new instance of the object representing the same state and backed by the same underlying resources. Coordinates with the original (and other instances) when the underlying resource should be closed. Throws an exception if the shared resource has already been closed.

      • getSegment

        public FileDataInput getSegment(long position)
        Overrides:
        getSegment in class SegmentedFile
        Returns:
        The segment containing the given position: must be closed after use.

      • copyReadableBounds

        public long[] copyReadableBounds()
        Description copied from class: SegmentedFile
        Retrieve the readable bounds if any so they can be cloned into other files such as when downsampling an index summary. Readable bounds are in between record locations in a file that are good positions for mapping the file such that records don't cross mappings.
        Overrides:
        copyReadableBounds in class SegmentedFile
